# package_name

Description. 
The package package_name is used to:
	- pacote_herancas:
        Animais.py
        Veiculos.py
    -pacote_metodos:
        abc.py
        metodo.py
    -pacote_treino:
        Biciclta.py

## Installation

Use the package manager [pip](https://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/) to install package_name

```bash
pip install ESTUDOPOO
```
